aboutUs.info:
We are a Madrid-based indie pop rock band formed by Sara, Hari, Manuel, Curro, and Jesús Manuel.

Our songs stand out for their overwhelming energy, rhythms that will make your hips move on their own, and catchy melodies that will stick in your head.

In 2024, we were finalists in the FIB Heineken Silver Rising Stars, second place in the Fiestas de Arganzuela, finalists in the band battle at the Vicálvaro festivals, performed in Málaga at the Brisa en tu Barrio festival, and played at the Plaza de Callao in the Zurich Madrid Rock'n'roll Running Series, among other notable events.

In 2025, we performed in Logroño at the band battle of the Festival Actual and at Vivo Back to Bands organized by Universal Music.

Additionally, we’ve started working with All Sounds on the communication for our upcoming LP ‘Que sólo nos quede ganar’.
aboutUs.title: About us

lesarts.subtitle: Vote for us to see us in the lineup!
lesarts.text: We are participating in the contest to play at Festival de les Arts! If you want us to be in the lineup of the next edition, vote for us!
lesarts.title: Festival de les Arts contest

20250614.text: Don't miss a night that promises to be unforgettable. On Saturday, June 14th, we'll be sharing the stage at El Perro with Valiente Bosque for an indie party packed with bangers — we'll be waiting for you!
20250614.title: Valiente Bosque + Sweet Q

20250802.text: For all nature lovers, we'll be playing in the beautiful village of Berceo (La Rioja) as part of the Sonoverso Festival lineup on August 2nd. Great wine, great music, and great company — what more could you ask for? Well, yes... to see you there!
20250802.title: Sonoverso Festival

info.subtitle: Already available
info.text: You can now listen to 'Fiesta' on all platforms, a tribute to those moments when the only thing that matters is living in the present with all possible intensity. Give it your all!
info.title: Fiesta

presave.subtitle: Available on May 23rd
presave.text: Don't miss our upcoming single 'Fiesta', one of our most powerful tracks that will make you give it your all on the dance floor. Pre-save now!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

fiestasArganzuela.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
fiestasArganzuela.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Fiestas de La Melonera in Arganzuela in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!
fiestasArganzuela.title: Fiestas de Arganzuela 2024

ley.subtitle: Ley de la atracción
ley.text: We’ve just released our music video for 'Ley de la atracción', filmed in the heart of Madrid with the collaboration of real couples who shared unique moments with us to bring this song to life. We hope you like it!
ley.title: New music video
